mapper.select: select * from user where UserID = #{userID} and IsDelete = 0
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO user(UserID,UserName,Phone,Password,Address,Reserve1,Reserve2,Reserve3, Reserve4, Reserve5, Reserve6, Reserve7) values(#{userID},#{userName},#{phone},#{password},#{address},#{reserve1},#{reserve2},#{reserve3},#{reserve4},#{reserve5},#{reserve6},#{reserve7})
mapper.update: update user set UserName=#{userName}, Phone=#{phone}, Password=#{password}, Address=#{address}, Reserve1=#{reserve1}, Reserve2=#{reserve2}, Reserve3=#{reserve3}, Reserve4=#{reserve4}, Reserve5=#{reserve5}, Reserve6=#{reserve6}, Reserve7=#{reserve7}, where UserID=#{userID}
